SEARCH
Package epj2.util

Class VehicleLoader

java.lang.Object
epj2.util.VehicleLoader
public class VehicleLoader extends Object
A utility class for loading vehicles from a CSV file. This class provides methods to read vehicle data from a CSV file and create Vehicle objects. The CSV file should have specific columns for vehicle attributes.
Version:
27.8.2024.
Author:
Jelena MaletiÄ‡

  • Method Details

    • loadVehiclesFromCSV

      public static Map<String,epj2.model.vehicle.Vehicle> loadVehiclesFromCSV()
      Loads vehicles from a CSV file into a map where the keys are vehicle IDs and the values are Vehicle objects.. The CSV file should have the following columns: -ID -Producer -Model -Purchase Date -Purchase Price -Range (for Bike) -Max Speed (for Scooter) -Description (for Car) -Type (car, bike, scooter) If a line in the CSV file is not in the expected format or if the vehicle type is unknown, it is skipped. Duplicate IDs are not accepted and lines containing such IDs are also skipped.
      Returns:
      a map where the keys are vehicle IDs and the values are Vehicle objects.

    • parseDate

      private static LocalDate parseDate(String dateStr)
      Parses a date string into a LocalDate object. The date string should match the format specified by DATE_FORMATTER. If the date format is invalid, an error message is printed, and the method returns null.
      Parameters:
      dateStr - the date string to parse.
      Returns:
      the parsed LocalDate object, or null if the date format is invalid.
